publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3967 Richard Lochhead: Congratulations to KT Tunstallâ€”That the Parliament congratulates KT Tunstall from St Andrews on being named Best Female Solo Artist at the Brit Awards; believes that her recent arrival on the music scene should provide inspiration to other aspiring contemporary musicians in Scotland; welcomes the success of the many other original and successful acts hailing from Scotland, and notes that the nation is being increasingly recognised as home to a vibrant wealth of musical talent that deserves to be nurtured and supported.

S2M-3967 Congratulations to KT Tunstall (lodged on 17 February 2006) Fiona Hyslop*, Rob Gibson*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Eleanor Scott*, Bruce Crawford*, Bill Aitken*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S2M-3967 Congratulations to KT Tunstall (lodged on 17 February 2006) Mr Adam Ingram*, Michael Matheson*
S2M-3967 Congratulations to KT Tunstall (lodged on 17 February 2006) Iain Smith*, Scott Barrie*
S2M-3967 Congratulations to KT Tunstall (lodged on 17 February 2006) Frances Curran*
S2M-3967 Congratulations to KT Tunstall (lodged on 17 February 2006) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-3967 Congratulations to KT Tunstall (lodged on 17 February 2006) Rosie Kane*
